title: 77/260/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 March 1977 concerning aid planned by the Belgian Government towards the extension of capacity of an oil refinery at Antwerp (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 22 March 1977  concerning aid planned by the Belgian Government towards the extension of capacity of an oil refinery at Antwerp  (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)  (77/260/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Kingdom of Belgium may not implement its plan for aid to anti-pollution investment at a refinery in Antwerp unless the interest relief grant is on a sum of not more than Bfrs 460 million.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 March 1977.
For the Commission
Raymond VOUEL
Member of the Commission
